title: release: Repack of 1.4.1?
body:
Can someone upstream here confirm 1.4.1 was intentionally repacked? The SHA1 on the download page changed, and there wasn't much in the way of explanation.

Caused a bit of a nightmare for [Homebrew](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/pull/36054) and possibly other package managers this morning :crying_cat_face:.
